text: Ab agar yeh log tumse jhaghda karein, to inse kaho : “ maine aur mere pairawon (followers) ne to Allah ke aagey sar tasleem kham kardiya hai”. Phir ehle kitab aur gair ehle kitab dono se pucho: “ kya tumne bhi uski itaat o bandagi qabool ki?” Agar ki to woh raah e raast paa gaye, aur agar issey mooh moda to tumpar sirf paigaam pahuncha dene ki zimmedari thi, aagey Allah khud apne bandon ke maamlaat dekhne wala hai
